Please fill the details below to Create your Account
We are Glad to have you back..!!

About AssignMate:

 Designed & developed by :
Pratik Nandvikar.

 AssignMate is an android Application which lets students share their notes and Assignments with their friends/classmates.!! 

Benefits of using AssignMate:

 1.Once a study material is uploaded on AssignMate it will be accessible to everyone who is using AssignMate.

 2.AssignMate allows us to organize Assignments,Practical and Question Papers of particular subjects by uploading them in their categories.

 3.Once the document is uploaded it will never get lost and will always accessible.

 4.One can always access the document by navigating through the subjects and their categories.

 With the help of AssignMate we altogether can collaborate and share our knowledge and provide assistance to others in their Classwork.
